t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    print(max(abs(n - m) - k, 0))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    mi = min(n, m)
    ma = max(n, m)
    c = ma - mi
    rc = k - c
    if rc < 0:
        print(abs(rc))
    else:
        print(0)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    diff = abs(n - m)
    print(0 if k >= diff else diff - k)

for x in range(int(input())):
    (A, O, K) = map(int, input().split())
    if A == O:
        print(0)
        continue
    s = min(A, O)
    b = max(A, O)
    print(0) if s + K >= b else print(b - (s + K))
